message.content:
1. There were patients who required analgesics after ESWL.
2. In group 1, 8 patients required analgesics after ESWL.
3. The percentage of patients who required analgesics after ESWL in group 1 was 19.5%.
4. In group 2, 13 patients required analgesics after ESWL.
5. The percentage of patients who required analgesics after ESWL in group 2 was 30.2%.
6. The p-value comparing the need for analgesics after ESWL between group 1 and group 2 was 0.31.

messages.content:
Statement: The patients who required analgesics after ESWL were 8 (19.5%) in group 1 and 13 (30.2%) in group 2 (p=0.31).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
